last_episode_to_air.name: Defenders of the Panama Canal
last_episode_to_air.overview: A stronghold in Panama defends a prized American possession, a mad scientist shares an herbal remedy from his hilltop castle, a ghostly German railroad divides  a fractured city and a Bulgarian mountain retreat offers hope to its residents

name: Mysteries of the Abandoned
overview: Documentary series investigating why some of the world's most advanced architectural achievements were abandoned.

episodes.name: Nazi Ghost Town
episodes.overview: The series about abandoned engineering achievements begins with a Soviet megastructure, massive Nazi brainwashing complex and dangerous desert pass.

episodes.name: Curse of Hell Island
episodes.overview: Exploring a ghost town that was once a dangerous industrial hellscape, a giant warship at the bottom of the ocean, and a top-secret relic that could have changed the Cold War.

episodes.name: Phantoms of Chernobyl
episodes.overview: Exploring what happened to the large town just outside of Chernobyl on the eve of disaster, a fleet of ghost ships, and a dangerous mountain road that changed history.

episodes.name: Wild West Apocalypse
episodes.overview: Stories of incredible engineering projects that are now deserted, including a massive military site that was once a hotbed for nuclear testing, a top-secret airbase hidden inside a mountain, and an otherworldly power plant.

episodes.name: Soviet Doomsday Device
episodes.overview: Abandoned engineering projects include a classified Soviet machine built to prevent all-out nuclear war, a top-secret Nazi facility, and a strange tower that left an enduring legacy.

episodes.name: The Tesla Conspiracy
episodes.overview: Some of the world's most incredible engineering projects are now deserted; Explore what happened to a cutting-edge research complex built by a visionary genius, an ambitious Nazi project that met a sinister end, and a Cold War relic that changed history.

episodes.name: Armageddon Highway
episodes.overview: A strange Cuban prison, an eerie escape route built for Armageddon, and an underwater marvel that changed history are mysterious deserted engineering projects, and new discoveries reveal how they were built and why they were abandoned.

episodes.name: Curse of the Haunted Prison
episodes.overview: A mysterious American pyramid built out of Cold War paranoia, a haunted prison, and a cluster of structures in the Atlantic are mysterious deserted engineering projects, and new discoveries reveal how they were built and why they were abandoned.

episodes.name: Arctic Hell Pit
episodes.overview: Traces of a Russian hole to hell in the Arctic, a military base in America's wild west, and a strange looming tower are mysterious deserted engineering projects, and new discoveries reveal how they were built and why they were abandoned.

episodes.name: Desert Ghost Fort
episodes.overview: A secret Russian military base in the Gobi Desert, a strange complex in an American wasteland, and a relic high atop a mountain are mysterious deserted engineering projects, and new discoveries reveal how they were built and why they were abandoned.

episodes.name: Conspiracy on Devil's Mountain
episodes.overview: A secret structure on a sinister mountain, an industrial compound swallowed by a forest, and a mysterious run in a sand dune are strange deserted engineering projects, and new discoveries reveal how they were built and why they were abandoned.

episodes.name: Secrets of the Alien Shrine
episodes.overview: A strange alien shrine on a mountain peak, a bridge built in the Alaskan wilderness, and an American castle with a dangerous secret are mysterious deserted engineering projects. New discoveries reveal how they were built and why they were abandoned.

episodes.name: Amazon Ghost Town
episodes.overview: An American ghost town in the Amazon jungle, a secret Nazi base, and a deadly concrete fortress 866 miles long are mysterious deserted engineering projects, and new discoveries reveal how they were built and why they were abandoned.

episodes.name: Sea Fortress of Doom
episodes.overview: A terrifying sea fortress, a highway in the Amazon that suddenly vanishes, a mysterious structure in the shadow of the Statue of Liberty are deserted engineering projects, and new discoveries reveal how they were built and why they were abandoned.

episodes.name: Doomsday at Dragon's Teeth
episodes.overview: Eerie ghost ships stranded in an alien desert, sinister ruins known as the Dragon's Teeth, and a ghostly complex with a bloody past are deserted engineering projects, and new discoveries reveal how they were built and why they were abandoned.

episodes.name: Nightmare on Blood Mountain
episodes.overview: A ghost ship thousands of miles away from where anyone expected, a bridge to nowhere in Florida's Hurricane Alley, and a haunting mountain complex with a bloody secret are deserted engineering projects; new discoveries reveal why they were abandoned.

episodes.name: Tower of Death
episodes.overview: An alien Nazi structure that changed history, a strange Soviet monolith known as the Tower of Death, and a concrete ocean giant are deserted engineering projects, and new discoveries reveal how they were built and why they were abandoned.

episodes.name: Underwater Ghost Prison
episodes.overview: An entrance to the underworld in the American wild, a haunting Soviet underwater prison, and a strange complex of towers in a forest of ice are deserted engineering projects; new discoveries reveal how they were built and why they were abandoned.

episodes.name: America's Doomsday Town
episodes.overview: A strange deserted city in America's heartland, an eerie gigantic wall deep in snow-capped mountains, and a mysterious top-secret Soviet facility are deserted engineering projects. New discoveries reveal how they were built & why they were abandoned.

episodes.name: City of the Damned
episodes.overview: A deserted town in Spain with a bloody past and a ghost fleet heading nowhere are homes to dark American secrets, and new discoveries reveal how they were built and why they were abandoned.

episodes.name: The Town That Disappeared
episodes.overview: A haunted lighthouse on Lake Michigan, a town where everyone seems to have vanished all at once, and a secret complex of tunnels beneath London are deserted engineering projects.

episodes.name: Nazi Death Star
episodes.overview: New discoveries reveal how an unfinished Nazi fortress was built.

episodes.name: The Real Shawshank
episodes.overview: An eerie prison with a dark past that became the setting of an iconic Hollywood movie and alien monoliths on a strange and remote island are deserted engineering projects, and new discoveries reveal how they were built and why they were abandoned.

episodes.name: Secrets of Alien Stonehenge
episodes.overview: An alien Stonehenge with a sinister purpose, an eerie building filled with strange labyrinths, and an endless concrete track in the middle of nowhere are deserted engineering projects, and new discoveries reveal why they were abandoned.

episodes.name: World's Strangest Ghost Towns
episodes.overview: The world's strangest ghost towns are home to dark secrets, creepy buildings and eerie sights; new discoveries reveal why they were abandoned.

episodes.name: Secret of Supervillain Island
episodes.overview: On a strange island off the coast of Croatia, the mysterious ruins of a long-abandoned hideout look like they once belonged to a James Bond super-villain, and new discoveries reveal why it was built and why they were abandoned.

episodes.name: Escobar's Castle
episodes.overview: The ruins of a once-palatial compound contain the secrets of one of history's most notorious criminals, and new discoveries reveal why this high-security estate was built and why it was abandoned.

episodes.name: Labyrinth of the Dead
episodes.overview: Tunnels filled with human bones lie beneath the streets of Paris, and this horrifying engineering marvel points to a dark secret; new discoveries reveal why this grisly underground death maze was built and why it was abandoned.

episodes.name: Treasure of Outlaw Valley
episodes.overview: A ghost town in the American West was once a Gold Rush hotspot and one of the most violent places in America. Today, there are legends of a secret treasure buried in the surrounding hills, and new discoveries might finally reveal its true location.

episodes.name: Alaska's Fort Apocalypse
episodes.overview: In Alaska, the ruins of a massive compound point to eerie evidence of an apocalyptic mystery. New discoveries reveal why this strange marvel was built in the snowy wilds of the Last Frontier  and why it was abandoned.

episodes.name: Alien Hell Portal
episodes.overview: A strange complex of tunnels on the grounds of a bizarre mansion were under lock-and-key for a century. Since its rediscovery, some believe its mysterious place is a gate to hell. New discoveries reveal its secret purpose and why it was abandoned.

episodes.name: Pompeii's Gate To Hell
episodes.overview: Near the destroyed city of Pompeii, an eerie complex of underground tunnels snake beneath a volcano, and some believe these passages were intended as a gateway to hell. New discoveries reveal exactly why they were built and why they were abandoned.

episodes.name: Haunting on Plague Island
episodes.overview: A strange complex of buildings on a remote tropical island was once home to a large seaside community, but today, locals avoid the area and claim that it's haunted. New discoveries reveal why this eerie place was built and why it was abandoned.

episodes.name: Jungle of the Damned
episodes.overview: At an infamous prison in the Amazon, dangerous criminals faced hard labor, a hostile environment and death by guillotine; today, it's deserted and new discoveries reveal why this hellish compound was built and abandoned.

episodes.name: American Atlantis
episodes.overview: An abandoned town in the Nevada desert is the ruins of an American Atlantis, destroyed by catastrophic floods when the Hoover Dam was built; experts investigate the secrets of this eerie ghost town as water levels recede and the city reemerges.

episodes.name: Haunting of Heartbreak Castle
episodes.overview: A one-time fairytale castle is rumored to be haunted; experts investigate the secrets and ghostly stories of this eerie fortress.

episodes.name: Kingdom of the Vanished
episodes.overview: A mysterious town in South Africa is deserted, even though it was once a booming community; experts reveal the cataclysm that caused the people of this once-prosperous town to suddenly leave and never come back.

episodes.name: Journey to Outcast Island
episodes.overview: On a desolate island near Greece, abandoned buildings are evidence of a group of people that were forbidden to leave; experts reveal who was forced to stay here and if there was a cover-up to conceal what really happened at this strange place.

episodes.name: Secrets of the Doomsday Caves
episodes.overview: A vast network of subterranean bunkers in the American west was home to the power to destroy nations, but today, this facility is deserted, and new discoveries reveal why this eerie place was built and why it was abandoned.

episodes.name: The Devil's Prison
episodes.overview: A haunted prison with a terrifying past once housed America's most notorious criminals, but today, the fortress stands in ruin, and experts reveal evidence of ghostly secrets hidden in the crumbling jailhouse walls.

episodes.name: Curse of Satan's Catacombs
episodes.overview: An abandoned system of caves was once the meeting place of a secret society that worshiped Satan and performed black magic, and new discoveries at this mysterious site reveal what really happened here and why a Founding Father was a frequent guest.

episodes.name: Swamp of Despair
episodes.overview: In a remote Louisiana swamp, the ruins of a massive industrial operation suggest that something evil once happened here, and new discoveries at this eerie site reveal what these abandoned buildings were for and why they were deserted.

episodes.name: End Times on Lake Michigan
episodes.overview: An abandoned industrial complex by Lake Michigan was once a top-secret military compound that protected America from enemy attacks; new discoveries reveal what really happened here and why the government turned its back on this juggernaut.

episodes.name: Hell on Blood Island
episodes.overview: An island of dense jungle is home to an abandoned complex with a dark past of bloodshed and rebellion, and new discoveries at this deserted place reveal why it was built and the gruesome circumstances of its downfall.

episodes.name: Florida Doomsday Castle
episodes.overview: A strange bunker near the Kennedy Space Center once served a top-secret military function should doomsday ever come to the Sunshine State; experts use declassified intel to reveal the sinister purpose of this forbidding facility and why it was abandoned.

episodes.name: The Killer in the Castle
episodes.overview: An abandoned castle is the site of hundreds of horrific murders perpetrated by the mysterious countess who once lived there, a woman alleged to be one of the most prolific killers in history; new discoveries reveal what really happened here.

episodes.name: Towers of Blood
episodes.overview: Abandoned towers in southern Greece are the ruins of a fearsome warrior civilization descended from the Spartans, and new discoveries reveal the role these towers played during generations of violent blood feuds among the clans that lived here.

episodes.name: The Thing on Hell Mountain
episodes.overview: A massive, alien-like fortress built into a mountainside is the central node to a network of pipelines that race outwards like tentacles; behind-the-scenes access reveals the secrets of why this strange complex was built and why it was abandoned.

episodes.name: Anarchy on Ireland's Alcatraz
episodes.overview: The ruins of an abandoned prison are evidence of a chaotic riot that put the prisoners in charge; special access to its burnt-out interior reveal how inmates took over Ireland's Alcatraz and why it is deserted today.

episodes.name: House of Horror
episodes.overview: An eerie set of buildings in Paris is evidence of an unspeakable evil; new discoveries reveal the horrific things that happened here, and why they were abandoned.

episodes.name: Nightmare at Fort Paranoia
episodes.overview: A strange bunker in a treacherous landscape once belonged a notorious dictator who's paranoid fantasies drove bizarre and elaborate feats of engineering; new discoveries reveal the secrets of these structures and why the nightmares that built them.

episodes.name: Into the Murder Labyrinth
episodes.overview: An underground labyrinth can warp the mind and turn friend into foe.

episodes.name: American Ghost Park
episodes.overview: An abandoned theme park is home to secrets of a forgotten, imaginary world.

episodes.name: Secrets of Mafia Island
episodes.overview: Experts reveal how Mafiosi was imprisoned on a Mediterranean island.

episodes.name: Greatest Icons
episodes.overview: Experts reveal 10 of the world's most iconic abandoned places.

episodes.name: Factory of Death
episodes.overview: Experts investigate a classified military wasteland with a deadly past.

episodes.name: Ghosts of Black Mountain
episodes.overview: Experts investigate the ghostly remnants of a beautifully constructed town.

episodes.name: The Doom of El Dorado
episodes.overview: Experts uncover the haunting remnants of a settlement in the Nevada desert.

episodes.name: Ruins of the Rust Belt
episodes.overview: Deserted buildings are evidence of a citys lost industrial past.

episodes.name: Fortress of the Spy
episodes.overview: Experts investigate the ruins of a spys former battlefield.

episodes.name: Mystery of the Alien Base
episodes.overview: Experts examine a military cover-up with extraterrestrial objectives.

episodes.name: Ghosts of the Cursed Castle
episodes.overview: The ruins of a historic Scottish castle is now a bewitching wilderness of hidden dangers with deadly booby traps obscured afoot; experts and historians reveal a bygone Second World War military hospital with bizarre ties to an infamous Nazi occupant.

episodes.name: The Good, Bad and Abandoned
episodes.overview: The world's abandoned structures hold new evidence about the lives and deeds of history's greatest heroes and villains, and using the latest discoveries at these mysterious sites, experts count down the ten most significant.

episodes.name: Ruins of Disaster Park
episodes.overview: A collection of ramshackle structures with a mystical facade lie mysteriously deserted on the tropical island of Bali; experts investigate and uncover the ruins of a bizarre amusement park complex with a disastrous past.

episodes.name: Fortress of Nuclear Secrets
episodes.overview: Experts investigate bunkers that conceal a deadly nuclear secret.

episodes.name: Plague on Hell Island
episodes.overview: Experts investigate the deadly legacy of an abandoned sea fort.

episodes.name: Florida Death Fortress
episodes.overview: A desert island contains a marooned structure with a contagious past.

episodes.name: Hollywood vs. Nazis
episodes.overview: A war-torn Italian ghost town immortalized by a legendary Hollywood director blurs the lines between fiction and reality; experts investigate and uncover a forgotten landscape of ruins captured in a WWII documentary.

episodes.name: Hitler's Nightmare Palace
episodes.overview: The ruins of a dreamlike Polish palace hide an astonishingly dark history that's shrouded in mystery to this day; experts investigate and uncover an ornate gothic structure that concealed a nightmare of Nazi experimentation.

episodes.name: Alien Ghost Tower
episodes.overview: A breathtaking stainless steel tower seems otherworldly and out of place in the remote mountain forests of Croatia; experts investigate and uncover a dark past of Nazi-led conflict and a monument to a desperate fight for survival.

episodes.name: Russian Mafia Resort
episodes.overview: Experts uncover a derelict resort complex constructed by the Russian mafia.

episodes.name: Ghosts of Mount Fortune
episodes.overview: The haunting remains of an isolated ghost town high in the Colorado mountains suggest a once booming mining community left in devastation; experts uncover an inhospitable land of shattered dreams where fortune seekers chased the American dream.

episodes.name: Chinese Nuclear Box
episodes.overview: An enormous concrete box with bizarre circular openings looms on the coast of an island near mainland China; Experts investigate and uncover tunnels leading to an enormous underground complex that nearly triggered a nuclear war.

episodes.name: Derelict Housing of Protest
episodes.overview: The bizarre remnants of a housing complex lie mysteriously deserted in an Ohio industrial town; experts investigate and uncover the dark, turbulent past of an oppressive steel company and labor strikes that resulted in deadly riots.

episodes.name: The Beached Leviathan
episodes.overview: An enormous war machine lies stranded in a coastal grave along the beaches of Dagestan, Russia; experts investigate and uncover the ruins of an experimental Soviet ground-effect vehicle designed to strike fear in Western governments during the Cold War.

episodes.name: Desolation of Ponte City
episodes.overview: A residential complex turns into a dystopian ruin in South Africa.

episodes.name: Bangkok's Ghost Tower
episodes.overview: A luxurious skyscraper in Bangkok is now an eerily derelict ghost tower.

episodes.name: Ruins of the Nazi Resort
episodes.overview: A majestic estate for the rich and powerful now lies abandoned in the highlands of Argentina; experts investigate and uncover a once struggling hotel that was transformed into a luxurious resort outpost for elite Nazi German sympathizers.

episodes.name: Romanian Royal Desolation
episodes.overview: The ruins of a once lavish destination are now deserted in Romania.

episodes.name: Ruins of the Zoo Fortress
episodes.overview: The ruins of a coastal fortress sit atop a jagged outcrop along the beaches of Wales; experts investigate and uncover a derelict 19th-century British fortification that housed a series of occupants, including an exotic, private zoo.

episodes.name: Hidden Hell of Angel Island
episodes.overview: A cluster of military defensive structures among a quaint holiday village lie deserted on a San Francisco Bay island; experts investigate and uncover a mysterious Civil War outpost that conceals a dark and hellish history...

episodes.name: Ghost Village of Nazi Invaders
episodes.overview: An eerie ghost village in west-central France, Oradour-sur-Glane, appears as if it were mysteriously abandoned and destroyed all at once; experts investigate and uncover the remains of a derelict settlement left as a memorial to a murderous WWII Nazi raid.

episodes.name: Remnants of Traitor Chateau
episodes.overview: An opulent chateau perched in the middle of a lake now stands dilapidated in the Loire Valley of France; experts investigate and uncover the remains of a festering palace whose owner was labeled a traitor by France's most notorious king.

episodes.name: Remnants of Alien Contact
episodes.overview: A facility housing two enormous satellites stands derelict in Georgia.

episodes.name: Psychiatric Ruins of Scotland
episodes.overview: Ruins of an imposing mental health institution lie deserted in Scotland.

episodes.name: Desolate Remnants of Agdam
episodes.overview: The remnants of a desolate ghost town are uncovered in Azerbaijan.

episodes.name: Hidden Tunnels of Gibraltar
episodes.overview: A forgotten military fortification lies hidden in the Rock of Gibraltar.

episodes.name: Remnants of Rocket Complex
episodes.overview: The remains of rocket testing facility lie in the Florida Everglades.

episodes.name: Secret Vaults of Scotland
episodes.overview: Subterranean vaults lie hidden beneath the streets of Edinburgh, Scotland.

episodes.name: Ruins of Variety Theater
episodes.overview: A once majestic theater now lies mysteriously derelict in Cleveland.

episodes.name: Curse of Cowboy Mountain
episodes.overview: The bizarre remains of an Old West mining town lie mysteriously deserted high in the mountains of Maggie Valley, North Carolina; experts investigate and discover an abandoned ghost town theme park that some local residents believe carries a curse.

episodes.name: Castle of the Nazi Occult
episodes.overview: A castle with an eerie attraction stands derelict in the Czech Republic.

episodes.name: Urban Ruins of Varosha
episodes.overview: An entire city district of desolate streets and derelict buildings lies mysteriously untouched for decades in Eastern Cyprus; experts investigate and uncover a once opulent resort town suddenly entangled in a Turkish military invasion.

episodes.name: Historic Remains of USS Hornet
episodes.overview: A legendary US Naval war vessel now stands as a monument to space exploration in Alameda, California; experts investigate and reveal how a formidable WWII aircraft carrier served a vital roll in historic Apollo spaceflight recovery missions.

episodes.name: Liberias Tower of Ruin
episodes.overview: A disintegrating tower once a thriving cultural hub now stands hollow and derelict in Monrovia, Liberia; experts investigate and uncover a landmark skyscraper left to decay in the wake of a bloody political coup.

episodes.name: Penthouse Palace
episodes.overview: A porn baron dreams up a hedonistic paradise to avert nuclear catastrophe.

episodes.name: Castle Kingdom
episodes.overview: Half-built castles stand as a whimsical reminder of a neighborhood that was supposed to feature thermal baths and panoramic views; the ambitious project came to an abrupt halt when the construction company began to face financial difficulties...

episodes.name: Rock 'N' Roll Island
episodes.overview: A Beatles legend builds a state-of-the-art studio on a Caribbean island.

episodes.name: K-Pop Dreamland
episodes.overview: This spooky, unfinished amusement park serves a different purpose nowadays.

episodes.name: The True Cross
episodes.overview: In a California desert, a once glittering Hollywood hotspot gets converted into a top-secret interrogation center for POWs.

episodes.name: Blues Prison
episodes.overview: Formerly known as one of the toughest prisons in America, this massive complex was once home to medical experiments and a chaotic hostage situation.

episodes.name: Fake News Fortress
episodes.overview: Graffiti scratched into the walls of a military base on the British coast sheds light on a secret raid against the Nazis.

episodes.name: Turkish Wonderland
episodes.overview: Remains of a grand vision become a symbol of excess in the Turkish capital.

episodes.name: The Montauk Conspiracy
episodes.overview: Conspiracies swirl around an abandoned military base in Long Island, where it's alleged that covert government experiments took place underground.

episodes.name: The Ruins of Troy
episodes.overview: In modern-day Turkey, on the coast of the Aegean Sea, archaeologists discovered hilltop ruins that are believed to be the site of one of the world's most enduring stories.

episodes.name: Hell Island
episodes.overview: On a picturesque island off the coast of Brazil, this penal colony was once the site of a dramatic prisoner uprising.

episodes.name: The Ruins of Archaeopolis
episodes.overview: This fortress once stood between the Ancient Roman and Persian Empires.

episodes.name: Korea's Joan of Arc
episodes.overview: A teenage girl in Korea is martyred in prison and becomes a national hero; the facility where she was held stands in remembrance of her bravery and the Korean struggle for independence...

episodes.name: Gunslingers and Gangsters
episodes.overview: Notorious gunslinger John Dillinger once pulled off a daring escape from this unassuming jail.

episodes.name: Gangbusters and Gun Battles
episodes.overview: A building in Colorado is still marked with bullet holes from a Wild West shootout between union members and state militia.

episodes.name: Propaganda Palace
episodes.overview: In the former Soviet Union, this theater and others like it were used to influence the minds of the masses.

episodes.name: Hunt for the Nazi Gold Train
episodes.overview: A Polish castle becomes entwined in the hunt for lost Nazi treasure, the heir of an American business tycoon gets caught in a web of controversy and an Irish estate is embroiled in a fight for freedom.

episodes.name: Schindler's Deception
episodes.overview: A place of hope in the Czech Republic quietly perseveres in the age of Nazi tyranny, a Moroccan politician sides with the French and an eco-friendly paradise in the Amazon proves to be unsustainable.

episodes.name: Operation Just Cause
episodes.overview: In Panama, a military base stands on the frontlines against a tyrant.

episodes.name: Defenders of the Panama Canal
episodes.overview: A stronghold in Panama defends a prized American possession, a mad scientist shares an herbal remedy from his hilltop castle, a ghostly German railroad divides  a fractured city and a Bulgarian mountain retreat offers hope to its residents
